Text.Name: Item_SummerClothes
Text.Desc: Very breathable clothing, but also protects one from cold slightly.

Text.Name: Item_SilkClothes
Text.Desc: Refreshing and relaxing clothing, wearing it feels pleasantly cool.

Text.Name: Item_PracticeClothes
Text.Desc: Standard uniform of a sect, allows one to stay relatively warm, but it is not very breathable.

Text.Name: Item_FormalClothes
Text.Desc: Casual everyday clothing, allows one to stay relatively warm, but it is not very breathable.

Text.Name: Item_WinterClothes
Text.Desc: Thick and solid clothing, allows one to stay absolutely warm.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes1
Text.Desc: Magical cloth woven with dragon scales. Wearing it increases one's Protection skill level.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes2
Text.Desc: Magical cloth with concentrated pure Yin power. Wearing it increases one's Spell skill level.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes3
Text.Desc: Magical cloth with concentrated pure Yang power. Wearing it increases one's Artifact Mastery skill level.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes4
Text.Desc: Magical cloth capable of deceiving the ways of heaven. Wearing it decreases one's Attainment.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes5
Text.Desc: Magical cloth with evil dispelling power. Wearing it can improve Mental State by driving the inner demons out of one's mind.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes6
Text.Desc: Magical cloth with concentrated pure Yang power. Wearing it increases one's Artifact Mastery skill level.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes7
Text.Desc: Magical cloth sewn with the hide of Blaze Rats. Wearing it can improve one's Protection skill level and effectively reduce Fire Damage.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes8
Text.Desc: Magical cloth capable of deceiving the ways of heaven. Wearing it decreases one's Attainment.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes9
Text.Desc: Magical cloth with concentrated pure Yin power. Wearing it increases one's Spell skill level.

Text.Name: Item_SP_Clothes10
Text.Desc: Magical cloth with evil dispelling power. Wearing it can improve Mental State by driving the inner demons out of one's mind.
